attributes.action: please stop the media making Princess Diana front page news 10 years after her death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Princess Diana died 10 years ago, so I don't see why she should constantly be on the tabloid headlines day after day. It is irritating and I think that the woman should be left in peace.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
